agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Criminal Justice TIME & DATE: 1:30 PM or upon adjournment Tuesday, March 12, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator John Whitmire The committee will meet for an organizational meeting to hear invited testimony from agencies including: Texas Juvenile Justice Department, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Texas Department of Public Safety, and Texas Commission on Jail Standards. The agenda will be available at the hearing.
